pages.text: The link card lets uses an inbuilt monazit circuit to store a link amongst machines. Cards created with against the same machine, will be on the same frequency

pages.title: Linked Card
pages.text: Once created, the card can be used in any machine that needs access to this frequency. However there is a limited range to this access

pages.title: Creative Card
pages.text: There is rumour of a mystical card that is linked to a realm of pure energy. Any machine using this card would run forever, but due to the nature of the realm, never be able to connect to another machine.
